short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy multiple texts, concatenate then and paste.
short.es: Copia multiples textos, los concatena y luego pega.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EcuaEloy Multicopy is Handsome-appearance Chrome Extension for efficient copying and pasting of multiple texts. With this powerful extension, you can bid farewell to the tedious task of copying and pasting one snippet at a time.

MultiCopyPaste simplifies your workflow by enabling you to copy multiple pieces of text and store them in a clipboard manager. As you come across various texts across different web pages or applications, simply copy them one after another. The extension intelligently saves each copied text in its memory, preserving your clipboard history.

When you're ready to paste your collected texts, EcuaEloy Multicopy provides a seamless experience. A single click on the extension's icon reveals a convenient clipboard history panel, displaying all the texts you copied. From there, you can effortlessly select and paste multiple texts into any input field or text editor, streamlining your work and saving valuable time.
